//: The default amount of time for a tip to be displayed before it cycles to the

ignored_namespaces.//: Tips from an ignored namespace will not be displayed in game.

ignored_tip_ids.//: Adding a tip ID here will prevent it from being displayed.

tip_render_width_percentage.//: The percentage of the screen width that tips should render over.

default_title.//: The default tile to use when rendering a tip.
